English (United States)(en-US): As soon as I saw him I hoped I was wrong.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그를 보자마자 나는 내 생각이 틀리길 바랐을 뿐.

English (United States)(en-US): But alas. I could sense him, on an intuitive level.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 하지만 안타깝게도, 나는 알 수 있었어. 본능적인 차원으로.
그가 어떤 감정으로 무슨 행위를 하고 있는지.

English (United States)(en-US): I felt... pain. As if it were my body being scratched.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 난…… 통증을 느꼈어. 내 몸뚱이가 긁히는 것마냥.

English (United States)(en-US): As his nails peeled back his skin, with every acute pulse of pain,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그가 자신의 피부를 긁어 낼 때마다, 날카로운 자극을 찾아들 때마다,

English (United States)(en-US): Blobs that looked like balled-up screams.
